member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Internal.RelationalStrings.UpdateConcurrencyException(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Database operation expected to affect {expectedRows} row(s) but actually affected {actualRows} row(s). Data may have been modified or deleted since entities were loaded. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=527962 for information on understanding and handling optimistic concurrency exceptions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Internal.RelationalStrings.MultipleProvidersConfigured
member.summary: Multiple relational database provider configurations found. A context can only be configured to use a single database provider.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Internal.RelationalStrings.NoProviderConfigured
member.summary: No relational database providers are configured. Configure a database provider using OnConfiguring or by creating an ImmutableDbContextOptions with a database provider configured and passing it to the context.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Internal.RelationalStrings.ConnectionAndConnectionString
member.summary: Both an existing DbConnection and a connection string have been configured. When an existing DbConnection is used the connection string must be set on that connection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.Entity.Internal.RelationalStrings.NoConnectionOrConnectionString
member.summary: A relational store has been configured without specifying either the DbConnection or connection string to use.
